Desc.entry: A registered charity which operates as an NVQ assessment centre for NVQ 2, 3 and 4 in Playwork. Also does assessor/verifier awards. Runs various short course programmes eg First Aid, Food Hygiene, Transition From Playwork to Childcare, Transition from Childcare to Playwork, Diploma in Playwork level 2/3 and other playwork qualifications. Holds some Safeguarding Children Training run by Sheffield Children's Service. Offers a membership package, check website for details.

ContactName.entry: Lynda Ray, Training Manager/Elaine Davies, Director/Sharon Bridges, Office Manager

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-4.30pm, Fri 9am-4pm (office times); holds management committee meeting on alternate months

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLES GROUPS - RESOURCES AND SUPPORT SERVICES
